SEARCH

Package org.lujza.quiz.util

package org.lujza.quiz.util
Provides utility classes and methods for the quiz application, such as file reading and data parsing utilities. These helpers facilitate the operation of the quiz by managing common tasks and operations.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lujza.quiz
    The root package of the Quiz Application, containing the main application logic and entry points.
    org.lujza.quiz.model
    Contains the model classes used by the quiz application, including representations of questions and themes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JsonReader
    The JsonReader class is responsible for loading and parsing JSON files containing theme data for quizzes.
    PointsCounter
    The PointsCounter class manages the scoring system for the quiz application.
    Stopwatch
    A Stopwatch class that implements a simple stopwatch functionality which can either count up from 0 or count down from a specified limit of seconds.
